content: out and figure out which is the bottom for the right or left mitt that you are working round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the right corner of the granny chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 9 double_crochet double_crochet in corner of granny work 11 double_crochet evenly across the palm join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 22 round 2 chain 1 half_double_crochet in same st *fpdc half_double_crochet repeat from * 9x fpdc join with a slip_stitch in half_double_crochet rounds 3-5 repeat round 2 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in same st *fpsc single_crochet repeat from * 9x fpsc join with a slip_stitch round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 *slip_stitch in next st chain 1 repeat from * 20x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off fingers round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the right corner of the granny chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet in next 9 double_crochet double_crochet in corner of granny work 9 double_crochet evenly across palm join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 20 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each double_crochet around join with a slip_stitch round 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 18x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off thumb round 1 join with a slip_stitch in the thumb hole chain 3 counts as double_crochet work 11 double_crochet evenly around join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 12 round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st decrease single_crochet in each of next 3 double_crochet decrease single_crochet in each of next 4 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 row 3 chain 1 *slip_stitch chain 1 repeat from * 8x join with a slip_stitch fasten_off and weave in ends granny fingerless gloves by jamyri designs page 3 medium instructions make 2 granny chain 4 slip_stitch to beg chain to form a ring or use a magic_ring round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 2 double_crochet in ring *chain 2 3dc in ring repeat from * 2x chain 2 join with a slip_stitch in 3rd chain of beg chain-3 round 2 chain 3 3 double_crochet in same corner *chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next corner repeat from * 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet in 1st corner chain 2 join with a slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet round 3 chain 3 3 double_crochet in same corner *chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next corner repeat from * 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 3 double_crochet in 1st corner chain 2 join with a slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet round 4 chain 3 3 double_crochet in same corner * chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 2 3 double_crochet in next corner repeat from * 2x chain 1 3 double_crochet in next chain-1 space 2x chain
